0: BROKEN ARROW, Okla. (AP) â€” Oklahoma authorities say three would-be burglars have been fatally shot by a homeowner's adult son who was armed with a rifle. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR The Wagoner County Sheriff's Office received a call around 12:30 p.m. Monday from someone inside a home who told dispatchers that people had broken into the house and that shots had been fired.
